import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod){ navigate('/payment'); } return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      { cart.cartItems.map(item => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • )) }
) }
